name: Prince Adamajapanahiko x Princess
description:
This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Developer Bakin.This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 30-50 minutes, with an emphasis on story elements to rescue several princesses from various dungeons. The player is given an unqiue skill and unlimited money. All of that, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers. Note: All 7 princesses or heroines character design are inspired from princess Solange (Code of Princess) with quite a lot of modification.StoryThe story It's smillar with Prince Ajapanadam x Princess and Prince Akazaka x Princess with different game engine.

Prince Adamajapanahiko, the prince from super modern kingdom Ajapanadamahiko alongside with his fiancee , princess Annkoreaeveacha from modern kingdom Akoreahan got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince Adamajapanahiko and Princess Annkoreaeveacha decided to save all princesses.Features
  • RPG battle turn based
  • Adventure up to 6 dungeon and 2 village (Easy Mode, only focus on story)
developers: Prince Raden Adison アディソン
publishers: Prince Raden Adison アディソン
